00019 const ConstMap<std::string,int> Initialization = ConstMap<std::string,int>
00020     ("Random",KMEANS_RANDOM_CENTERS)
00021     ("PP",KMEANS_PP_CENTERS);

00024 inline void nargchk(bool cond)
00025 {
00026     if (!cond)
00027         mexErrMsgIdAndTxt("mexopencv:error","Wrong number of arguments");
00028 }

00031 
00039 void mexFunction( int nlhs, mxArray *plhs[],
00040                   int nrhs, const mxArray *prhs[] )
00041 {
00042     nargchk(nrhs>=2 && nlhs<=2);
00043     vector<MxArray> rhs(prhs,prhs+nrhs);
00044     int id = rhs[0].toInt();
00045     string method(rhs[1].toString());
00046     
00047     // Constructor call
00048     if (method == "new") {
00049         nargchk(nrhs>=3 && (nrhs%2)==1 && nlhs<=1);
00050         int clusterCount = rhs[2].toInt();
00051         TermCriteria criteria;
00052         int attempts=3;
00053         int flags=KMEANS_PP_CENTERS;
00054         for (int i=3; i<nrhs; i+=2) {
00055             string key(rhs[i].toString());
00056             if (key=="Criteria")
00057                 criteria = rhs[i+1].toTermCriteria();
00058             else if (key=="Attempts")
00059                 attempts = rhs[i+1].toInt();
00060             else if (key=="Initialization")
00061                 flags = Initialization[rhs[i+1].toString()];
00062             else
00063                 mexErrMsgIdAndTxt("mexopencv:error","Unknown option %s",key.c_str());
00064         }
00065         //obj_[++last_id] = BOWKMeansTrainer(clusterCount,criteria,attempts,flags);
00066         obj_.insert(pair<int,BOWKMeansTrainer>(++last_id,
00067             BOWKMeansTrainer(clusterCount,criteria,attempts,flags)));
00068         plhs[0] = MxArray(last_id);
00069         return;
00070     }
00071     
00072     // Big operation switch
00073     BOWKMeansTrainer& obj = obj_.find(id)->second;
00074     if (method == "delete") {
00075         nargchk(nrhs==2 && nlhs==0);
00076         obj_.erase(id);
00077     }
00078     else if (method == "add") {
00079         nargchk(nrhs==3 && nlhs==0);
00080         obj.add(rhs[2].toMat(CV_32F));
00081     }
00082     else if (method == "getDescriptors") {
00083         nargchk(nrhs==2 && nlhs<=1);
00084         plhs[0] = MxArray(obj.getDescriptors());
00085     }
00086     else if (method == "descriptorsCount") {
00087         nargchk(nrhs==2 && nlhs<=1);
00088         // plhs[0] = MxArray(obj.descripotorsCount());
00089         plhs[0] = MxArray(obj.descripotorsCount()); // OpenCV has typo...
00090     }
00091     else if (method == "clear") {
00092         nargchk(nrhs==2 && nlhs==0);
00093         obj.clear();
00094     }
00095     else if (method == "cluster") {
00096         nargchk(nrhs<=3 && nlhs<=1);
00097         if (nrhs==2)
00098             plhs[0] = MxArray(obj.cluster());
00099         else
00100             plhs[0] = MxArray(obj.cluster(rhs[2].toMat(CV_32F)));
00101     }
00102     else
00103         mexErrMsgIdAndTxt("mexopencv:error","Unrecognized operation %s", method.c_str());
00104 }
